trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> maintains two ActivityTrackingLocationCollection objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> specifies parameters used for matching activity status events and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> specifies parameters used to exclude activity status events from matching.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Een <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>onderhoudt twee ActivityTrackingLocationCollection objecten: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>Hiermee geeft u de parameters die worden gebruikt voor het afstemmen van de status van activiteitsgebeurtenissen en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>geeft gebruikt status activiteitsgebeurtenissen om uit te sluiten die overeenkomen met parameters.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection> to an empty list.
trans-unit.target: De standaardconstructor initialiseert de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection>op een lege lijst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"></xref> class by using a list of activity locations.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection"> </xref> klasse met behulp van een lijst van locaties van de activiteit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection> is initialized to contain the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects specified in `locations`.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection>is ge√Ønitialiseerd voor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>objecten die zijn opgegeven `locations`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocationCollection>

trans-unit.source: locations is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: locationsis een null-verwijzing ( in Visual Basic).
